title: Pinarello Nytro E x TQ e-Road claims to be World’s Lightest Mid-Drive eBike from 11.4kg
content:
Pinarello is taking it ebike game to the next level with a lighter, more neatly-integrated family of Nytro E road ebikes powered by TQ’s latest…
